8 control purePursuit::get_control(Vector3d robot_pose, Vector2d goal){
9 
10  Vector2d robot_point;
11  robot_point(0) = robot_pose(0);
12  robot_point(1) = robot_pose(1);
13  Vector2d pursuit_point = goal - robot_point;
14  double dist = pursuit_point.norm();
15  std::cout<<"dist:"<<dist<<std::endl;
16  if(std::sqrt((robot_point - goal).dot(robot_point - goal)) > 0.5){
17  pursuit_point = 0.5*pursuit_point.normalized();
18  }
19 
20  double theta =std::atan2(pursuit_point(1), pursuit_point(0)) - robot_pose(2);
21  if (theta > M_PI)
22  theta = theta - 2 * M_PI;
23  else if (theta < -M_PI)
24  theta = theta + 2 * M_PI;
25 
26  double r = pursuit_point.norm()/(cos(M_PI_2-robot_pose(2))*pursuit_point(0) - sin(M_PI_2-robot_pose(2))*pursuit_point(1));
27 
28 
29  if(dist > 1.0){
30  ctrl.v = 0.3;
31  }else if(dist <= 1.0){
32  ctrl.v = 0.15;
33  }else if(dist <= 0.5){
34  ctrl.v = 0.1;
35  }
36  ctrl.w = ctrl.v / r;
37 
38  if(dist < 0.1){
39  ctrl.v = 0.0;
40  ctrl.w = 0.0;
41  }
42 
43  return ctrl;
44 }
